Texts.Eng:
Vash'Knaaren are composed of a single crystal protected by organic metal plates and stony flesh.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Entity

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;20^reset;% Physical, Radioactive, Shadow
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Darkness, Poison, Proto-Poison, Extreme Radiation
  ^cyan;Acid Spray Tech^reset;

  ^green;Extreme Radiation^reset;: ^cyan;Minimal Regeneration^reset;
  ^green;Dark^reset;: Health, Defense x^green;1.15^reset;

  Bioweapon Mastery: +^green;40^reset;%

  ^red;Charisma^reset; -^red;40^reset;%
